subject: fix: add text labels to PWA install/update buttons, make mutually exclusive
body:
Install and update buttons now show "Install" / "Update" text alongside
their icons for better discoverability. They are mutually exclusive -
update takes priority when both conditions are true (update available
trumps install prompt).
